query: What is the most engaging movie genre during Christmas holidays?

tool_plan.note: To get the IDs of movies released in December (Christmas holidays).
To get the top 3 popular movies released in December.
To get the movie genres of the most popular movies and reason about what could be the most popular/engaging genre.
